Pre-Game Insights: India will have the option to test out their bench, while Sri Lanka will be looking to end the series on a high.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitches at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Pallekele have been very good for batting in the first two T20I matches of the series, allowing the batters to score runs at a quicker pace.
Others: Suryakumar Yadav, the Indian captain, has a better chance of calling the toss right in comparison to Charith Asalanka, the captain of Sri Lanka.
The average first innings score is 170 at this venue in T20Is, while the first innings score in the upcoming match could range between 175-185.
